programme.title: Online America
programme.short_synopsis: Does a reliance on computers mean the return of the Luddites?
programme.medium_synopsis: The dangers of an online America, the importance of considering a sentence before committing it to paper, and the possible return of the Luddites are considered by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
